email_body: Please approve Ina Rangel for a corporate American Express. Phillip Allen -----Original Message----- From: Rangel, Ina Sent: Friday, July 13, 2001 11:06 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: American Express Letter Phillip, Here is the following letter. I put the amount that we are currently spending on food per month. As of right now, we are having to borrow different peoples credit cards for lunches. A lot of restaurants do not open accounts on credit. They only take payment at time of order. Ina Rangel
